about_the_game:
"Seed Bash" is a fun and exciting local multiplayer game that can be played with a gamepad. The objective of the game is for players to control oak seeds that have fallen from a tree and compete for the perfect sprouting place on the playing field. By successfully planting themselves, they can grow into a tree. Players must use their skills and tactics to defeat their opponents and claim the top spot. The game offers fast-paced arena fighting action and is sure to provide hours of fun for friends and family.

This game offers an action-packed arena experience for 2-4 players. At the start of a match, each player chooses from a selection of 3 Abilities, divided into Tiers 1-3. By progressing through the game by earning points, the Abilities are unlocked as the match progresses. Points can be earned by fighting other players. The last survivor wins the game.

Features:

- 2-4 players can spawn in an arena
- Each player chooses 3 Abilities at the beginning of a match
- Abilities are unlocked during the course of the match
- Points can be generated through battle interactions with other players
- The last remaining player is the winner

content_descriptors.notes: This game could possibly include representations of exaggerated violence.

legal_notice: This game was developed by Daniel Otto, Michael Kaiser and Dominik Geuer as part of the Global Game Jam 2023
name: Seed Bash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX680 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX980 or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: "Seed Bash" is a local multiplayer game where players control oak seeds fighting for the perfect sprouting place. It's a fast-paced arena fighting game played with a gamepad.
